name: Suspicious Load DLL via CertOC.exe
description: Detects when a user installs certificates by using CertOC.exe to loads the target DLL file.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\certoc.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:CertOC.exe) AND (process.command_line:*\-LoadDLL* AND process.command_line:*.dll*))`
